Posts.Content: Nov 25, 2013 07:04AM 760Liss wrote: I also have been experiencing all the same symptoms for about a month now. I got a little bump on my areola that started to itch and went away after a few days. Then it flaked over and started to swell and itch again. I've been getting a few pains in my right breast but fear it might just be my anxiety. My dermatologist had me on a 3 week waiting list and I feel like it's getting more irritating and swollen everyday. I called the nearest Dr and have an appointment at 10am . I'm kind of scared and right there with you. I pray the best for your results.
Posts.Title: Question on Itchy Nipple / Areola danielle3 Moderators
